scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "cd backend && pnpm dev" "cd frontend && pnpm dev"
scripts.publish:electron: node pumb-version.js && cd backend && pnpm build && cd ../frontend && pnpm run publish:win
scripts.build: cd backend && pnpm build && cd ../frontend && pnpm build:win
scripts.lint: cd backend && pnpm lint && cd ../frontend && pnpm lint
scripts.format: cd backend && pnpm format && cd ../frontend && pnpm format
